title: Resolve a Supplier Invoice Discrepancy
description: The accounts payable team has flagged a supplier invoice where the price charged is higher than the price on the PO.

tasks.description: Retrieve the purchase order and the supplier's invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up both documents for comparison.

tasks.description: Compare the line item prices and identify the discrepancy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the supplier charged a higher price for one of the items.

tasks.description: Contact the supplier with the evidence and request a corrected invoice or a credit memo.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal dispute to the supplier with the PO and invoice attached.
